title: dru dru tOm taka dhIm(t)
sahitya:
dru dru tOm taka dhIm nanata tana dhiranA tana dhiranA tana dhiranA


anupallavi

  dhIm dhIm dhIm dhIm dhIm nanana dhIm nanana dhIm nanana tOmnA
taLAngu taka tOm taka taka tOmnA taLAngu gtaka tOm taka taka tOmnA


caraNam    tattari kiTataka tAm tattari kiTataka dhI tattari kiTataka tOm tattari kiTataka nA
tarikiTa takata tarikiTa taka dhI tarikiTa tOm tarikiTa takanangkiTa taka kiTataka dhI 
kiTataka tOm kiTataka nAtakata taka dhI taka tOm takana tadhittanana
gAyaka janavara dAyaka varavAggEyakAra kula vandanIya 
gaNanIya muraLIgAna priya mahanIya tyAgarAya gururAya 
			(repeat anupallavi, then pallavi)
